definition: (used of tobacco) aging as a preservative process (`aged' is pronounced as one syllable), people who are old collectively
details:
adjective
- (used of tobacco) aging as a preservative process (`aged' is pronounced as one syllable)
= synonyms: cured
- of wines, fruit, cheeses
= synonyms: ripened
- advanced in years
= example: advanced in years
= synonyms: older
- at an advanced stage of erosion
= example: at an advanced stage of erosion
- having attained a specific age
= synonyms: of age
noun
- people who are old collectively
= example: people who are old collectively
= synonyms: elderly
